author: IGN
description:
We sit down with Monster Hunter Wilds Executive Director and Art Director Kaname Fujioka to discuss creating the Oilwell Basin biome, with plenty of gameplay footage of the area to accompany the conversation. 

Be sure to check out IGN's YouTube channel and IGN First playlist for the rest of our exclusive Monster Hunter Wilds content we've rolled out all January long!
title: Monster Hunter Wilds: Exploring the Oilwell Basin With the Capcom Developers – IGN First

description: Check out the ‘The Vigilante’ Overview Trailer for Sworn, a co-op action roguelike developed by Windwalk Games. Get the rundown on The Vigilante, a deadly rogue with the ability to tear through enemies with ease. Sworn is launching into Steam Early Access on February 6 for PC with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch later in 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the new Tomb Raider 4 - 6 Remastered trailer for the collection of remastered classic Tomb Raider games developed by Aspyr and Crystal Dynamics. Players can make use of the game's Photo Mode and video maker called Flyby Camera Maker which allows for fine-tuning of in-game shots with various settings like; Roll, Field-of-View, Zoom, and movement speed. FlyBy Camera Maker is launching with Tomb Raider 4 - 6 Remastered, launching on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#TombRaider #Gaming #LaraCroft
title: Tomb Raider 4 - 6 Remastered - Official FlyBy Camera Maker Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the latest trailer for Sinners, an action horror thriller distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.

Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

Sinners stars Michael B. Jordan, Hailee Steinfeld, Jack O'Connell, Wunmi Mosaku, Delroy Lindo, Lola Kirke, Omar Benson Miller, Li Jun Li, and more. The film is produced by Zinzi Coogler, Sev Ohanian, and Ryan Coogler with the executive producers being Ludwig Göransson, Will Greenfield, and Rebecca Cho.

Sinnera is in theaters only nationwide on April 18, 2025, and internationally beginning on April 16, 2025.
title: Sinners - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Michael B. Jordan, Hailee Steinfeld

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Darkest Dungeon 2: Kingdoms trailer for this new update for the RPG roguelike. Kingdoms is a new game mode available now in Darkest Dungeons 2 on PC and Mac, with consoles to follow at a later date. Kingdoms features a completely reimagined game structure and is a parallel game experience to the original Confessions game mode.

In Kingdoms, you are tasked with defending the realm from incursions by all-new enemy-factions. Journey across the land in your stagecoach, upgrade your Inns, complete quests, and defeat the final boss.

Kingdoms will feature themed adventure modules, each containing a different threat. Up first is Hunger of the Beast Clan, where you will be tasked with fending off the pitiless onslaught of the rotting and ravenous beastmen! Two more adventure modules are planned for release in 2025.
title: Darkest Dungeon 2: Kingdoms - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Space Engineers 2 is available now on Steam Early Access. Watch the latest Space Engineers 2 trailer for another look at this sandbox game sequel where engineering meets exploration and survival in the vast expanse of space.

In Space Engineers 2 Alpha, players step into the role of a solo space engineer, venturing into the asteroid cluster of the distant Almagest system. This environment acts as a personal playground in space, where engineers can do whatever they want: from building massive ships, crazy contraptions and experimenting with wild ideas, to simply blowing everything up just for fun.

#SpaceEngineers2 #Gaming #Games
title: Space Engineers 2 Alpha - Official Steam Early Access Release Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Yooka-Replaylee Shovel Knight trailer for the open-world 3D platformer developed by Playtonic Games. Players can now embody the shovel-wielding hero once more with the return of Shovel Knight to the game. Shovel Knight's return also comes with a new and improved quest for players to embark on. Yooka-Replaylee is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#YookaReplaylee #Gaming #ShovelKnight
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Official Shovel Knight Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch as Henry lives his best life in a medieval world--from brawling, drinking, and romancing--in this chaotic Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 CGI trailer for the upcoming action RPG sequel. Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S on February 4, 2025.

Diving back into the heart-pounding world of 15th Century Bohemia (Central Europe), Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 picks up where its predecessor left off, thrusting players into the shoes of Henry, the steadfast son of a blacksmith, embroiled in a tumultuous tale of vengeance, betrayal and self-discovery.

#KingdomComeDeliverance2 #Gaming #Games
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Official CGI Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Dead by Daylight trailer for the reveal of Tome 22: Anguish, which brings new memories for The Blight and Jane Romero to the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. Follow The Blight as he continues his experiments to better comprehend the sinister nature of a Bleed. Meanwhile, Jane interviews family members of those lost to The Fog, discovering just how far the effects of The Entity can extend beyond its Realm. Dead by Daylight's Tome 22: Anguish begins today, January 28, 2025.

In Dead by Daylight's Tome 22: Anguish, you can also earn a series of outfits, including the Ultra Rare Outfits for Jane Romero and The Huntress, as well as ensembles for David King, Renato and Thalita Lyra, The Blight, The Plague, and The Knight.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dead by Daylight - Official Tome 22: Anguish Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Moana 2 trailer for this Walt Disney Animation Studios animated musical film. Moana 2 is available for purchase on Digital today, January 28, 2025, and coming to Blu-ray on March 18, 2025. 

Moana 2 reunites Moana (voice of Auli‘i Cravalho) and Maui (voice of Dwayne Johnson) three years later for an expansive new voyage alongside a crew of unlikely seafarers. After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana must journey to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she’s ever faced. Directed by David Derrick Jr., Jason Hand and Dana Ledoux Miller, and produced by Christina Chen and Yvett Merino, “Moana 2” features music by Grammy winners Abigail Barlow and Emily Bear, Grammy nominee Opetaia Foa‘i, and three-time Grammy winner Mark Mancina. Jared Bush and Miller are writing the film, which is executive produced by Jennifer Lee, Bush and Johnson. 

The film also features returning stars Rache
title: Moana 2 - Official Digital and Blu-ray Release Date Trailer (2025) Auli‘i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson

author: IGN
description: Heroes of Newerth makes a return. Check out the Heroes of Newerth: Reborn announcement trailer for this upcoming MOBA, featuring upgrades, enhanced player experience, over 80 heroes available at launch with more planned, improved performance, and more. Heroes of Newerth was originally released in 2010. Heroes of Newerth: Reborn will be launched as a free-to-play game on the iGames platform.
title: Heroes of Newerth: Reborn - Official Announcement Trailer

description: Introducing a new strategy game for PC called Sniper at Work, which mixes mission planning and in-the-moment creative improvisation to create a unique sniping game. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3452800/Sniper_at_Work
title: Sniper at Work - Official Reveal Trailer

description:
Don't miss our Exborne gameplay impressions! Exoborne is shaping up to be a solid entry in the budding extraction shooter genre with both twists – and twisters – that set it apart from the competition. Previewed by Mitchell Saltzman.

#Exoborne #Gaming #IGN
title: Exoborne Is an Extraction Shooter With a Twist(er)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Tekken 8 anniversary trailer for the latest installment in the fighting game franchise developed by Bandi Namco. Reminisce on the launch of not only Tekken 8 but Tekken as a mainstay in the gaming space with the Anniversary Trailer celebrating one year of Tekken 8 and 30 years of Tekken as a whole. Tekken 8 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Tekken8 #Tekken #Gaming
title: Tekken 8 - Official Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description: If you’re shopping for a gaming headset, Michael Higham has you covered. In this  Budget to Best episode, we compare the Turtle Beach Stealth 500, HyperX Cloud III, Audeze Maxwell, and SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro. Each headset offers something different, whether you’re after affordability, premium sound, or advanced features. We’ll help you figure out which one works for your setup and budget.
title: The Best Gaming Headsets (Early 2025) - Budget to Best

author: IGN
description:
Watch our The Stone of Madness review by Eric Van Allen on PC, also available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.

The Stone of Madness has some excellent art and great moments of sneaking around. But what should have been a fairly replayable and interesting prison break ends up buckling under the weight of its technical problems. Progress-halting bugs, graphical issues, and finicky controls all turn otherwise-engaging sneaking missions into frustrating excursions. With some extra tuning, The Stone of Madness could be a refreshing take on tactical stealth. As-is, there are too many obstacles getting in the way of what’s good here.

#Gaming #IGN #Games
title: The Stone of Madness Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'The OTC' Announcement Trailer for WWE 2K25, the latest installment in the wrestling simulation franchise developed by Visual Concepts. Players will experience WWE like never before with game-changing features, iconic Superstars, and more to be revealed with Roman Reigns taking the front cover of WWE 2K25. WWE 2K25 is launching on March 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#WWE2K25 #Gaming #IGN
title: WWE 2K25 - Official 'The OTC' Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch a sword expert react to Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2! How realistic is Warhorse Studios' latest open-world action RPG? We got sword expert Matt Easton to look at sword vs. sword KCD2 combat, how a mace and shield combo might work, medieval siege warfare, and more Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 gameplay. Matt shares his expertise on how siege warfare was conducted, and how realistic the combat in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 really is.

Matt Easton is a Historical European Martial Artist (HEMA), Antique Arms Dealer, and owner of the fencing club Schola Gladiatoria.

00:00 - Intro
00:57 - Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Sword vs. Sword
04:56 - Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Mace & Shield VS. Sword
06:50 - Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Siege Defence
10:40 - Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Guns
11:57 - Final Thoughts

#KingdomComeDeliverance2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Sword Expert Reacts to Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

author: IGN
description:
Hogwarts Legacy may be a few years old at this point, but that won't stop it from becoming even more beautiful when paired with Nvidia's RTX 5090 graphics card. With the immenent realease of the new 50 Series line, the addition of DLSS 4 and Multi-frame generation, we had to put Hogwarts Legacy on the 5090 to the test and see how well it performs with all settings maxed out on ultra. Ray Tracing and ray reconstruction have been enabled with DLSS scaling set to quality. We also test out the major FPS gained when changing DLSS scaling to Ultra Performance mode.

00:00 - Intro
00:10 - Outside Hogwarts Castle
02:26 - Inside Hogwarts Castle
06:41 - Ultra Performance mode
10:02 - End - Combat

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hogwarts Legacy: RTX 5090 Gameplay on Ultra Settings With Ray Tracing
